alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, northwestern Chambers, southwestern Liberty and northeastern Harris Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Atascocita, or near Humble, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Pasadena, Humble, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Cloverleaf, Channelview, Kingwood, Spring, Highlands, Barrett, Aldine, Crosby, northwestern Mont Belvieu, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Northshore and Hunterwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
